definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: This is a 1-inch putt if you're playing golf.
sentences.chinese: 就如同打高尔夫时的1英寸推杆。

sentences.english: Full adjustable push rods under forks ensure stability of forks.
sentences.chinese: 推杆可调，使货叉保持平衡。

sentences.english: Rudder offset is simply adjusted by the length of the pushrod.
sentences.chinese: 鲁德尔抵消只是由推杆长度调整。

sentences.english: The cam follower rides against a push rod, which pushes against a rocker arm.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮挺杆推动控制摇臂的推杆。

sentences.english: Motor-driven push-rod design, adjust arbitrarily the angle of the crus and the back.
sentences.chinese: 电动推杆设计，任意调节小腿和靠背高低角度。

sentences.english: The player then instinctively throws his putter toward the ball, but misses.
sentences.chinese: 随后，球员本能地把推杆扔向球，但没碰到球。

sentences.english: Get the putter square. Put the putter flat.
sentences.chinese: 先将推杆方正地设定好，杆头放平。

sentences.english: Direct push-rod revolving locking mechanism, the adjustment of focus is quick and easy.
sentences.chinese: 采用直拉推杆旋转锁紧结构调焦。

sentences.english: Push rod and intermediate shaft must be frequently per year lubricated by ball bearing grease.
sentences.chinese: 推杆和中间轴必须每年用轴承油润滑。

sentences.english: How do these old school putters stack up in the present day?
sentences.chinese: 如何将这些老学校推杆堆栈的今天呢？

sentences.english: No push-stick suitable for such cutting operation was provided.
sentences.chinese: 该次锯木工序并无提供适当的推杆。

sentences.english: How fast you swing the putter.
The weight savings realized from the polymer face is redistributed to the heel and toe for more stability in every stroke.
sentences.chinese: 推杆的重量将移到杆头后方，增加更好的稳定性。

sentences.english: The only thing that bothered Woods was missing the 18-foot birdie putt.
sentences.chinese: 伍兹独一担心的就是错过了18英尺的小鸟球推杆。

sentences.english: Insert in edge of bag, Used to fix the putter.
sentences.chinese: 插于球袋口，用于固定推杆。

sentences.english: A player preparing to putt asks his caddie to attend the flagstick .
sentences.chinese: 一名正准备推杆的球员让他的球童照料旗杆。

definition: club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns
